task.summary: simplified and sped up perlin code...finally starting to understand how it works. moved graphics updates from being triggered by player movement to happening every 16 ms.
need to commit before changing to different OS.
added resizability to window, split initialization code into different methods, changed draw function, and changed tile map out-of-bounds handling
